hero.name: Natthaphong Thepphithak (Au)
hero.title: DevOps Engineer
hero.description: B.Eng. in Computer Engineering from Chiang Mai University (First-Class Honors, GPAX 3.87). Passionate about building scalable CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and DevSecOps practices. Currently empowering 13M+ users through SCB EASY mobile banking infrastructure.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: A comprehensive set of DevOps, cloud, and development capabilities.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: My professional journey and key contributions in DevOps and software development.

achievements: Act as one of four DevOps engineers responsible for CI/CD for SCB EASY mobile banking application, serving 13M+ active users.
Design, maintain, and optimize end-to-end CI/CD pipelines integrating DevSecOps practices and significantly reducing execution time.
Implemented an AI-agent–driven pipeline to analyze CVEs in base images and recommend remediation.
Manage Azure infrastructure deploying microservices to AKS and provisioning supporting services via Terraform.
Contribute to migration of source repositories from GitLab to GitHub, enhancing CI/CD pipelines for multiple Git providers.
Provide DevOps consulting for small to mid-sized teams, focusing on CI/CD pipeline design using Jenkins, GitHub/GitLab, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Design and implement containerized deployment workflows on cloud platforms emphasizing scalability and automation.
Deliver training and hands-on workshops on Docker, Kubernetes, and DevOps practices.

jobs.company: Chiang Mai University's Faculty of Engineering
achievements: Worked across multiple roles (Fullstack Developer, DevOps Engineer, Project Manager) to deliver high-impact solutions.
Developed a fully functional scholarship management system serving 500+ students and 50+ staff members yearly.
Implemented DevOps best practices, reducing deployment time by 80% and enhancing system reliability.
Demonstrated strong leadership by setting clear project goals and managing team dynamics.
Troubleshot, developed, and optimized Terraform modules for Azure Cloud within the SCB core banking project.
Designed and implemented automated configuration validation pipeline in Jenkins using Groovy and Python.
Proactively addressed unique cloud service challenges by crafting innovative solutions shared with cross-functional teams.
Designed and implemented elderly registration and home visit coordination system using Line OA and Line LIFF.
Developed a user-friendly technology platform for nationwide volunteers.
Created a system with significant personal and social impact, streamlining volunteer operations.

projects.title: Personal Projects
projects.description: Showcasing my passion for building innovative solutions and problem-solving.

items.title: Screetner (Street Scanner)
items.description: Senior project: End-to-end system for scanning local government assets. Mobile app captures asset data via video with cloud-based processing. Video pipeline extracts taxable signboards using YOLOv8 and visualizes on web platform. Auto-scaling processing on Azure for cost optimization.

items.title: OCR Tools with Functional Programming
items.description: Highly modular OCR web application using functional programming paradigms. Leverages Monads, function composition, and higher-order functions for predictable text processing. Implements pure functions and immutable data structures for maintainability.

items.title: BOTMAPS
items.description: Full-stack web application for visualizing Computer Engineering Department's floor plan at Chiang Mai University. Integrates TeamUp API for real-time room schedules with features for viewing room availability and course details.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Amazing
contact.description: I'm currently available for DevOps consulting, training, and freelance work. Whether you need CI/CD pipeline design, cloud infrastructure, or just want to discuss DevOps practices, feel free to reach out!
